maintenance_procedures.Cable_Specification: shielded twisted-pair for analog and digital signals, follow manufacturer's cable requirements for Fieldbus, maintain overall shield continuity
maintenance_procedures.Calibration_Frequency: at least annually for safety-critical instruments
maintenance_procedures.Corrective_Maintenance_Action: repair or replace failed instruments promptly
maintenance_procedures.Data_Sheet_Fields: device tag, communication protocol, node address, power consumption, hazardous area certification, input/output type, signal range, isolation rating, manufacturer model
maintenance_procedures.Documentation_Requirements: calibration data, date, technician, calibration equipment used, certificates
maintenance_procedures.Network_Architecture_Considerations: segment length limits, number of devices per segment, redundant media for critical systems, isolation with repeaters
maintenance_procedures.Out_Of_Tolerance_Action: remove from service, tag, repair or replace, evaluate process impact, implement corrective action
maintenance_procedures.Ppe_Requirement: appropriate PPE when working on process equipment
maintenance_procedures.Preventive_Maintenance_Tasks: routine inspections (visual check of cables, enclosures, indications), clean sensors, replace consumables (filters, membranes, diaphragms), lubricate moving parts
maintenance_procedures.Record_Retention: maintain calibration certificates and maintenance records for audit and compliance
maintenance_procedures.Spare_Parts_Inventory: maintain list of critical spares for regulators and fittings
maintenance_procedures.Technician_Qualification: qualified technicians trained on specific instrument types
maintenance_procedures.Training_Topics: new technologies, safety regulations, maintenance software

requirements_and_criteria.Calibration_Equipment_Types: deadweight testers, pressure pumps, electronic calibrators
requirements_and_criteria.Communication_Protocol_Support: HART, FOUNDATION Fieldbus H1, Profibus PA/DP, Modbus RTU/TCP, WirelessHART / ISA100, Industrial Ethernet
requirements_and_criteria.Intrinsic_Safety_Barrier_Selection_Crite: gas group, temperature class, voltage/current requirements, matching with field device entity parameters
requirements_and_criteria.Signal_Conditioning_Requirements: Intrinsic safety (IS) barriers, signal isolators, surge protection devices (SPDs), IS power supplies
